en.description: 🎭A wildfire plugin that allows you to comment with user info without signing-in. More details, please refer to [Issue 33](https://github.com/cheng-kang/wildfire/issues/33).
en.title: Extended Anonymous Comment

zh-CN.description: 🎭一个让用户可以通过填写用户信息而不是注册、登录来进行非匿名评论。参考这个 [Issue](https://github.com/cheng-kang/wildfire/issues/33) 的讨论。
zh-CN.title: 匿名评论拓展
